pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bible in Pohnpeian language. Copyright 2006 United Bible Societies. We are grateful to UBS via its Australian office to permit us to distribute this Bible text. May it be a blessing to Pohnpeians in Pohnpei and around the world. Dakuma Lucios (dakluc@gmail.com) and Peter von Kaehne (refdoc@crosswire.org)
